objects.name: ControlsText
objects.string:
Controls:
Movement: WASD
Open Inventory: E
Close Inventory: E or Escape
Open Shop (When infront of shop): E
Close Shop: Escape
Manage Inventory: Click and drag on items
Swing Sword: Click with sword in hand
Aim Gun: Hold right click
Shoot Gun: Left click while aiming gun
Plant Seeds: Left click on farm plot with seeds in hand
Harvest Seeds: Left click on finished crop
Go To Main Menu: Escape (when not in shop)
Open Cheats Menu (if enabled in settings): C
Show Stats in Game: P

objects.name: AimText
objects.string:
Aim:
Earn money to buy upgrades
Beat the bosses in caves every 10 levels
Earn Achievements

events.name: Part of Gun Code Duplicated (Fixes Gun Rotation)

Part of Gun Code Duplicated (Fixes Gun Rotation)
